DOC.brief_summary: The Lawrence Latino Diabetes Prevention Project ( LLDPP ) community-based translational research study aim reduce risk diabetes among Latinos > 30 % probability develop diabetes next 7.5 year per predictive equation . The project conduct Lawrence , Massachusetts ; predominantly Caribbean-origin urban Latino community . Individuals identify primarily community health center 's patient panel , screen study eligibility , randomize either usual care lifestyle intervention condition , follow one year .
